description:
Description :
        Read [Immoral Anthology] Repentance of the Immoral PaladinSaintess Violet comes to the prison to save the Holy Knight Lahart' who has been eroded by demonic energy. Violet decides to save Lahart using the only healing method found in the old book. Lahart regains his senses with her help, but neither of them can easily extinguish their desire for each other
